languages.text: "Война и злой умысел не идут по нашим пятам, Муаран. Твой гнев нечестен".
"Neither war nor ill intent follow in our wake, Muaran. Your anger is unwarranted."
languages.original_text: "Война и злой умысел не идут по нашим пятам, Муаран. Твой гнев нечестен".

traits.locale_text: "Neither war nor ill intent follow in our wake, Muaran. Your anger is unwarranted."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Neither war nor ill intent follow in our wake, Muaran. Your anger is unwarranted."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Neither war nor ill intent follow in our wake, Muaran. Your anger is unwarranted."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Neither war nor ill intent follow in our wake, Muaran. Your anger is unwarranted."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “我们这次前来既不是为了开战，也没有任何恶意。你的愤怒毫无道理可言，穆兰。”
languages.original_text: "Neither war nor ill intent follow in our wake, Muaran. Your anger is unwarranted."

traits.locale_text: “我们这次前来既不是为了开战，也没有任何恶意。你的愤怒毫无道理可言，穆兰。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「ムアラン、戦争も悪意も、私たちにはない。あなたの怒りは不当だ」
languages.original_text: "Neither war nor ill intent follow in our wake, Muaran. Your anger is unwarranted."

traits.locale_text: 「ムアラン、戦争も悪意も、私たちにはない。あなたの怒りは不当だ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Ni la guerra ni la mala voluntad siguen nuestros pasos, Muaran. Tu ira es infundada».
languages.original_text: "Neither war nor ill intent follow in our wake, Muaran. Your anger is unwarranted."

traits.locale_text: «Ni la guerra ni la mala voluntad siguen nuestros pasos, Muaran. Tu ira es infundada».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Weder Krieg noch böse Absichten folgen uns, Muaran. Euer Zorn ist unbegründet."
languages.original_text: "Neither war nor ill intent follow in our wake, Muaran. Your anger is unwarranted."

traits.locale_text: "Weder Krieg noch böse Absichten folgen uns, Muaran. Euer Zorn ist unbegründet."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Nous ne sommes pas là pour déclencher une guerre ou vous faire le moindre mal, Muaran. Votre colère n'a pas lieu d'être. »
languages.original_text: "Neither war nor ill intent follow in our wake, Muaran. Your anger is unwarranted."

traits.locale_text: « Nous ne sommes pas là pour déclencher une guerre ou vous faire le moindre mal, Muaran. Votre colère n'a pas lieu d'être. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ne savaşa ne de başka bir fenalığa niyetliyiz Muaran. Boşuna öfkeleniyorsun."
languages.original_text: "Neither war nor ill intent follow in our wake, Muaran. Your anger is unwarranted."

traits.locale_text: "Ne savaşa ne de başka bir fenalığa niyetliyiz Muaran. Boşuna öfkeleniyorsun."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
